page.title: 17CONSTANTINE LANDSCAPE 3
page.content: ESTATE DEVELOPMENT;Three large estates have been built since 1945.Two of these are Kerrier council owned whilst one is a private development by a local firm Trethowans of Brill.Penbothidno estate was built in the late 1960's and there are now approximately 50 houses some of which are dwellings for senior citizens.Wheal Vyvyan estate named after the old mine,was built in 1970. There are 30 houses some of which are for senior citizens.They are a mixture of bungalows and houses.The private development on the Bowling Green was commenced in 1966 and has slowly developed over the years,there are now 17 houses and bungalows.Further development is about to take place. There is a small estate opposite the school of 12 houses built around 1966. Brill has an estate of 12 houses.
